Events that occurred on 27 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1915 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes You and Me / and the Cottage of Lost Play.
1932 - Voice actor Casey Kasem is born.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 286.
1998 - Voice actor Godfrey Kenton dies.
2015 - Cinematographer Andrew Lesnie dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 2941:
Thirteen dwarves and Gandalf arrive at Bag End. Bilbo learns of the Lonely Mountain and Smaug and agrees to accompany the dwarves and Gandalf on their adventure.
